name: Morris William
description: I am a simple and honest man with a great sense of humor. I am easy going person. I have a great immune system built up because I work on my body and my mind, I always want to keep fit. I like romantic gestures, walking and holding hands, and cuddling on the couch. I am looking for someone that is very honest that possess the fear of God in her, a truthful lady, well focused in life with good dreams for the nearest future, a lady that understand the true meaning of love. Someone who is kind, gentle and romantic, Someone I will share my life, my love and my everything with forever more. someone with good vision, intention and approach about life. someone who is comfortable with herself and believes that life is too short to be lonely
